Controller

类 GameWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.GameWindowController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GameWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Construction of a game includes indicators and visualization of backgroud and aircrafts
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> Aircrafts
      list of aircrafts and the list used for count kills of player
      private javafx.scene.text.Text Altitude 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text ammo 
      private javafx.scene.Group Background 
      private javafx.scene.Group BackgroundObject 
      static double CameraX
      X and Y location of Camera, Counter is used to eliminate informations of tips in time
      static double CameraY 
      private javafx.scene.control.Button Continue 
      static int Counter 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text fuel 
      private javafx.scene.Group group
      these groups are used to construct images in the stage group contains things like aircrafts the sky and ground are stored in the Background group houses, trees and other backgroud objects stored in the BackgroundObject group Weapon is used to store the bullets and externalloads
      private boolean haveExploded
      attribute used to controll explosion audio
      private javafx.scene.text.Text IAS 
      private javafx.scene.Group Indicators 
      static java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> Kills 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text mach 
      static MapObject map 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text overLoad 
      private javafx.scene.control.Button Pause
      Buttons for pause and continue, up is used for test and debug(the button with "R" in game)
      (专用程序包) static boolean record_start 
      (专用程序包) static boolean record_stop 
      (专用程序包) static java.util.Timer t
      Timer for the game
      private javafx.scene.text.Text TAS 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text Throttle
      These text attributes are used to show the information of player's aircraft
      private javafx.scene.text.Text Tips 
      private javafx.scene.control.Button up 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text upTips 
      private javafx.scene.Group Weapon 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text WeaponIndicator
      WeaponIndicator is used to show the name of current weapon
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView WeaponUI
      UI of the current weapon, you can see it in the right bottom of the game window
      private javafx.scene.text.Text X
      X is the location(value of x coordinate) of the player's aircraft Tips and upTips are used to indicate informations such as airbrake on and aircraft destroyed
      static double XMAX
      the size of map and map object
